```python
from textstat import textstat

text = "Human aging is when our bodies and minds slowly change as we get older. This can mean having more health problems, but also gaining wisdom and experience."
flesch_kincaid = textstat.flesch_kincaid(text)
print(f"Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level: {flesch_kincaid}")
```
